objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1a237e;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#303f9f;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='100%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#eceff1;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#b0bec5;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient></defs><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#grad1)'/><path d='M1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='url(#grad2)'/><g fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='20'/><circle cx='300' cy='300' r='15'/><circle cx='400' cy='400' r='10'/><circle cx='500' cy='500' r='15'/><circle cx='600' cy='600' r='20'/><circle cx='700' cy='700' r='15'/><circle cx='800' cy='800' r='10'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='15'/></g><g fill='#0d47a1' opacity='0.1'><circle cx='900' cy='180' r='20'/><circle cx='800' cy='280' r='15'/><circle cx='700' cy='380' r='10'/><circle cx='600' cy='480' r='15'/><circle cx='500' cy='580' r='20'/><circle cx='400' cy='680' r='15'/><circle cx='300' cy='780' r='10'/><circle cx='200' cy='880' r='15'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• Premium quality cotton fabric
• Classic crew neck style
• Modern, minimalist design
• Deep navy color for versatility

product_details.name: Inspirational 'Believe in Yourself' Premium Cotton T-Shirt
product_details.description:
• Bold, motivational 'BELIEVE' typography design in sophisticated navy tones
• Premium quality cotton fabric for maximum comfort and durability
• Classic crew neck style suitable for all occasions
• Modern, minimalist design with stylish script lettering
• Deep navy color that pairs easily with any outfit
• Perfect blend of casual wear and inspirational messaging
• Available in multiple sizes for perfect fit
• Easy-care machine washable material
• Versatile unisex design suitable for all gender expressions
• High-quality print that won't fade or crack after washing

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and modern layout with dynamic contrast. The left side showcases a deep, angular diagonal background featuring a rich gradient transitioning from deep indigo to royal blue, while the right contrasts with a light gradient from soft gray to pale silver-blue. At the top-left, a large, all-caps heading (`heading`) draws attention, followed by an elegant script-style tagline (`tagline`) that adds a personal touch. Beneath it, a bold subheading (`subheading`) and bullet-point product description (`description`) communicate key features clearly. The price (`price`) is prominently featured in large font, with a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) containing concise text (`cta`). A product image (`product_image`) is aligned to the right to balance the textual elements visually.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Indigo: #1a237e
- Royal Blue: #303f9f
- Light Gray: #eceff1
- Slate Gray: #b0bec5
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image features a navy blue t-shirt with a motivational quote "Believe In Yourself" in a stylish blend of serif and cursive typography. The primary color is a deep navy blue (#0F1A3A), which forms the base and evokes a sense of trust and depth. The text "BELIEVE" repeats in a bold, slightly lighter desaturated blue-grey (#3D4A5A), creating a layered visual background. The cursive "In yourself" in a soft light grey (#C3CAD7) adds a refined contrast that stands out while harmonizing with the overall palette. These colors are blended to maintain a coherent tone while highlighting the message.
